name: 猫咪黑帮
description:
Support English, bilingual subtitles!!


• Collect kitten fans
• Stealing followers from other cats
• Gather as many followers as possible
• Dodge puppy attacks

Hold the mouse still to control your cat. Run up to unclaimed kittens and let them follow you, or run up to cats that follow fewer kittens than you and steal their kittens. At the end of the round, the cat with the most followers wins. Dodging puppy attacks.

Thanks for the technical support of our cat "Huahua"!!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2559420
